about_the_game:
The adventure of the girls continues, in Queeny Army 2 you will be in charge of tying up the loose ends of the first game, to defeat the leader of the criminal organization to which the corrupt government belonged. This organization is divided into 3 main factions, the drug gangs known as “The Pipers”, Organizations and “social collectives” financed by the leader of the organization and the “Orange Beret” who are the army commanded by the criminal leader.

Meet new factions, new allies, new enemies, great final bosses in each level, an unparalleled challenge and perhaps familiar faces from the previous game.

The girls continued their training and now know new moves, there are new weapons and new bonuses that will make this adventure a little different from the previous one and with much more dynamism: Run, jump, glide, shoot, melee, run along the walls in the background, very Ninja style jumps and much more, that without forgetting the sensual touch of our cast of female protagonists who again make their appearance in San Romero, but now not as some avenging girls, but as members of the new state defense division along with their already known leader, trainer and tutor Eiji.

Don't miss this great adventure full of action, shooting, impossible jumps, extreme platforming, challenging bosses and rewards that will surely make you play this game more than once, full of surprises and different endings.

Just like the previous game, each girl has unique abilities that will make all your games different, and now you also have an improved weapon system that will make your experience with this title more comfortable and bearable.

content_descriptors.notes: It contains suggestive sprites and some nudity for different death sequences, grotesque deaths of some enemies, strong language and social collectives manipulated by the enemy faction.

detailed_description:
The adventure of the girls continues, in Queeny Army 2 you will be in charge of tying up the loose ends of the first game, to defeat the leader of the criminal organization to which the corrupt government belonged. This organization is divided into 3 main factions, the drug gangs known as “The Pipers”, Organizations and “social collectives” financed by the leader of the organization and the “Orange Beret” who are the army commanded by the criminal leader.

Meet new factions, new allies, new enemies, great final bosses in each level, an unparalleled challenge and perhaps familiar faces from the previous game.

The girls continued their training and now know new moves, there are new weapons and new bonuses that will make this adventure a little different from the previous one and with much more dynamism: Run, jump, glide, shoot, melee, run along the walls in the background, very Ninja style jumps and much more, that without forgetting the sensual touch of our cast of female protagonists who again make their appearance in San Romero, but now not as some avenging girls, but as members of the new state defense division along with their already known leader, trainer and tutor Eiji.

Don't miss this great adventure full of action, shooting, impossible jumps, extreme platforming, challenging bosses and rewards that will surely make you play this game more than once, full of surprises and different endings.

Just like the previous game, each girl has unique abilities that will make all your games different, and now you also have an improved weapon system that will make your experience with this title more comfortable and bearable.

short_description: The girls are back, enjoy this Run n Gun adventure with the girls, they will destroy the criminal organization, which ran the old corrupt government, get new weapons, enjoy the new moveset and the unique abilities of each girl, and finish with your enemies!
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
